{"id":422889936,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1606030940,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/422889936/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string convert(string s, int numRows) {\n        string str1;\n        char str[numRows][s.size()];\n        for(int i=0;i<numRows;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<s.size();j++){\n                str[i][j]='0';\n            }\n        }\n        int x=0,y=0;\n        int ind=0;\n        for(;ind<s.size();){\n        for(;x<numRows && ind<s.size();){\n            str[x][y]=s[ind++];\n            x++;\n        }\n            x--;\n        for(;x>=1 && ind<s.size();){\n            x--;\n            y++;\n            str[x][y]=s[ind++];\n        }\n            x++;\n        }\n        for(int i=0;i<numRows;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<(int)(2*s.size()/numRows)+1 && j<s.size();j++){\n                if(str[i][j]!='0'){\n                    str1+=str[i][j];\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return str1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion"}
